item.title: Samantha add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "Books don't offer real escape, but they can stop a mind scratching itself raw." -- David Mitchell

item.title: Samantha add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "Integrity is a bugger, it really is. Lying can get you into difficulties, but to really wind up in the crappers try telling nothing but the truth." -- David Mitchell

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Kathryn Erskine
item.description:
"Sometimes I read the same books over and over and over. What's great about books is that the stuff inside doesn't change. People say you can't judge a book by its cover but that's not true because it says right on the cover what's inside. And no matter how many times you read that book the words and pictures don't change. You can open and close books a million times and they stay the same. They look the same. They say the same words. The charts and pictures are the same colors.
Books are not like people. Books are safe." -- Kathryn Erskine
